ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced ore processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of an arc furnace will allow the processing of ores such as ilmenite and cobalt and produce more advanced alloys. Allows you to create an electric arc furnace to produce cobalt, nickel, chromium and palladium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Duty Alloys
ResearchProjectDef.description: The study of alloys will create new generation alloys that are many times superior to current ones. Allows you to create plasteel and titanium.
